title: Microsoft Outlook 2021
headline: Learn how to schedule and manage your emails to become more organised and productive in this free online Outlook course.
description: Microsoft Outlook 2021 is a productivity tool that helps you keep track of your schedules and email communication. This practical Outlook tutorial covers the features and functions of MS Outlook and lays out its interface and settings while explaining how to customize the program to suit your preferences. Email forms the backbone of much professional communication so this course suits anyone who wants to make the most of this powerful tool.
courseDescription:
With today’s global internet infrastructure, emails have also become a common means of professional and personal communication. Amid the increasing volume of messages sent back and forth, managing emails is an essential task for any individual. Microsoft Outlook 2021 offers easy ways to compose, send and receive emails from different accounts. This course teaches you how to work effortlessly with Outlook and improve productivity.

What are the settings in Outlook? How can its tools be customized? We begin by answering these questions and many more. Our first module examines Outlook’s interface and settings. The ‘quick access’ toolbar and ‘Outlook Today’ page help to organize your emails for faster access. We then explain how to configure different email accounts in Outlook. You will benefit from the ease with which you can access all your accounts in one place.

As the course progresses, we demonstrate the different commands and options used to categorize or flag your emails as you manage the space in your inbox. You will also learn how to add your email signature and many more elements to match your preferences. Organizional, productivity and administrative skills are always in demand because organizations value efficiency. These skills can also save time in our personal lives. Sign up to avoid the anxiety created by a jumbled inbox and learn how to streamline your email communication for greater productivity.
